Transformation Notes: [Manifestation]-->rdamd:P30455-->[value of $a]+" Number of reference: "+[value of $b]+"."-- ZP 7/28/2022

Problems with Mapping: This subfield is not mapped in the registry mapping, but number of references could be interpreted as 'details or other unstructured information' (RDA citation # 87.50.49.27). However this information shouldn't be presented just as a number as in MARC for the lack of specifity in RDA. Should be a text like '[value of $b] references contained in the bibliography' than just [value of $b]. -- ZP 3/23/2022
